Query.name: NO2_Avg_s
Query.text: from AirMeasurement#window.time(10 sec) select stationId as stationId, avg(no2) as value, currentTimeMillis() as TS group by stationId insert into NO2_Avg_s

Query.name: NO2_Avg_s2
Query.text: from P2#window.time(20 sec) select statio as stationId2, avg(so2*2) as value2, currentTimeMillis() as TS2 group by statio insert into NO2_Avg_s2

Query.name: NO2_Good_s
Query.text: from NO2_Avg_s[value >= 0.0 and value < 54.0] select stationId as stationId, 1 as levelNumber, 'NO2_Good' as levelName, currentTimeMillis() as TS insert into PollutantLevel
